author: christopheralanwest
body:
#### PR description:

This PR add UL18 V5 jet energy corrections + V2 jet resolution to 2018 and 2021 realistic MC as well as to the corresponding IOVs of the data GTs. Validation slides can be found at https://github.com/cms-jet/JECDatabase/blob/master/PDF/Summer19UL18_V5/Validation_Summer19UL18_V5_JEC.pdf.

The GT diffs are as follows:

**Offline data**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_dataRun2_v5/112X_dataRun2_v6

**Offline data (HEM failure)**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_dataRun2_HEfail_v5/112X_dataRun2_HEfail_v6

**Offline data relval**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_dataRun2_relval_v5/112X_dataRun2_relval_v6

**2018 realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_upgrade2018_realistic_v4/112X_upgrade2018_realistic_v5

**2018 realistic (HEM15/16 failure)**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_upgrade2018_realistic_HEfail_v4/112X_upgrade2018_realistic_HEfail_v5

**2018 cosmics (tracker deco mode)**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v4/112X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v5

**2018 cosmics (tracker peak mode)**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_peak_v4/112X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_peak_v5

**2021 realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_v11/112X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_v12

**2021 cosmics**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_mcRun3_2021cosmics_realistic_deco_v11/112X_mcRun3_2021cosmics_realistic_deco_v12

**2023 realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v11/112X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v12

**2024 realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v11/112X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v12

#### PR validation:

See the validation slides at https://github.com/cms-jet/JECDatabase/blob/master/PDF/Summer19UL18_V5/Validation_Summer19UL18_V5_JEC.pdf.

Also, a technical test was performed: `runTheMatrix.py -l limited,11024.2,7.4,7.23,12834.0 --ibeos`

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

This PR is not a backport but it will be backported to 10_6_X for the re-miniAOD.
title: Add UL18 V5 jet energy corrections + V2 jet resolution
